      • thinThickStepsOld

        public PixelIslandList thinThickStepsOld()
        thin all "thick steps". Zhang-Suen thinning sometimes leaves uneccesarily thick lines with "steps". remove all thick steps to preserve 2-connectivity (including diagonal) except at branches.
        Returns:
